abdullah.title: Founding Partner | Commercial and International Investment Law Expert
abdullah.description: With his authorized experience under BRAO 206, he leads at the intersection of strategic consultancy approach and law.
abdullah.about:
Av. Abdullah ÖREN, the founding partner of AOREN, stands out with his recognized competence under BRAO 206, especially in commercial law, international investment processes and corporate mergers. Thanks to his strategic vision, he not only provides legal solutions; he develops consultancy that directly contributes to his clients' business goals.

Throughout his career, he has played an active role in the legal structuring of hundreds of domestic and foreign companies, and with his experience in cross-border transactions, he has created a strong bridge on the Europe-Turkey line.

ekin.title: Criminal Law and Reputation Management Expert
ekin.description: Known for effective defense strategies in press law and white-collar crimes.
ekin.about:
Av. Şükrü ŞAHAN, a reliable guide in the complex nature of criminal proceedings, effectively represents his clients especially in white-collar crimes, press freedom violations and cyber security-focused cases.

He has developed strong strategies in media communication and reputation defense during crisis periods for individuals and companies in direct contact with the public. His success in judicial and preventive consultancy is appreciated by both individual and corporate clients.

melis.title: Family Law and International Inheritance Law Expert
melis.description: While approaching complex personal relationship files with empathy, she produces solutions with high sensitivity.
melis.about:
Av. Şahin DOĞAN is an expert with deep expertise in complex family structures, property regime arrangements and multinational inheritance files. He attracts attention with his ethical approach and solution-oriented communication style in emotionally sensitive files.

He is a name that foreign nationals living in Turkey and Turkish citizens living abroad consult with confidence in their family and inheritance transactions. He develops sustainable structures in asset planning, will arrangements and intergenerational transitions.

kerem.title: Labor Law and Corporate Compliance Consultant
kerem.description: He specializes in corporate human resources processes, risk management and ethical compliance.
kerem.about:
Av. Kemal SÜLDÜR, who plans the legal dimension of corporate human resources processes down to the finest detail, handles labor law practices not only on a contract basis, but also from the perspective of ethical and sustainable corporate structure.

He has also taken an active role in internal audit systems in multinational companies, KVKK/GDPR compliance and the relationship between business world & human rights. Thanks to his proactive consultancy approach, he controls the legal risks of institutions before they emerge.

We provide support in a wide range of areas, from legal structuring of domestic and foreign investments to contract design to competition law.

services.1: Company establishment and general assembly processes

international.title: Family Law & International Inheritance Law
international.subtitle: Every family is unique; so are their legal needs.
international.description:
AOREN provides effective and sustainable solutions in complex family structures and multinational inheritance transactions, taking into account emotional sensitivities. We provide not only legal but also strategic consultancy in matters such as divorce, property sharing, marriage contracts, custody arrangements.

In international inheritance planning, we put the intergenerational transfer of your assets under legal guarantee, taking into account different legal systems and citizenship situations.

realEstate.title: Real Estate and Investment Law
realEstate.subtitle: The value of your investments depends on a solid legal foundation.
realEstate.description:
AOREN provides comprehensive legal support for prestigious real estate projects and large-scale land investments. We are experts in land development, title deed transactions, urban transformation projects and legal management of investment portfolios.

We develop solutions focused on digitalization and sustainability in real estate, from PropTech startups to mixed-use projects.

services.1: Purchase-sale, rental and title deed transactions
services.2: Zoning law and project development consultancy

criminal2.title: Criminal Law and Digital Security
criminal2.subtitle: Your defense should be not only legal but also strategic.
criminal2.description:
AOREN develops strong and proactive defense strategies in the most complex areas of criminal law, especially in white-collar crimes, tax evasion, money laundering and cyber crimes.

We provide expert support in digital security issues, personal data protection, legal interventions after cyber attacks and reputation management processes.

health.title: Health Law
health.subtitle: The legal dimension of medical processes requires high expertise and sensitivity.
health.description:
As AOREN Legal Services, we provide comprehensive consultancy and representation services to our individual and corporate clients in the field of health law. We develop solution-oriented approaches in all kinds of disputes that may arise with private hospitals, medical centers, healthcare workers and patients.

We provide support especially in the following areas:

• Medical malpractice cases
• Patient rights violations and medical negligence claims
• Compensation processes after aesthetic interventions
• International health insurance and social security disputes
• Contracts and legal responsibilities within the scope of health tourism

Thanks to our strategic defense system supported by medical expert opinions, we protect our clients' rights at the highest level.

services.2: Patient rights violations and medical negligence

documents.title: Official and Commercial Document Procurement & Apostille Services
documents.subtitle: The documents you need to ensure the legal validity of your international transactions are now more accessible.
documents.description:
AOREN Legal Services accompanies you from start to finish in administrative processes such as official document procurement, notary approval, translation procedures and apostille certification. We develop time-saving solutions for both individual applications and commercial transactions.

Our service scope:

• Procurement of documents such as population registry records, court decisions, power of attorney
• Notary certification and sworn translation procedures
• Consular procedures and approval processes in foreign representations
• Obtaining apostille within the scope of the Hague Convention
• Multi-language document preparation (Turkish, German, English, French, etc.)

We serve with our digital-supported systems to provide the necessary documents for Turkish citizens living in Europe for their transactions in Turkey completely and quickly.

Trust AOREN to prepare your documents legally valid, linguistically correct and in accordance with international standards.

about.title: About Us

about.description: As AOREN Law Firm, we are a law firm that has adopted the principle of providing the highest quality legal service to our clients and serves with an experienced and expert team of lawyers.

legalServices.title: AOREN Legal Services
legalServices.description: AOREN Legal Services operates as a consultancy ecosystem that goes beyond the classical law firm approach and offers its clients not only legal representation but also solutions integrated with business strategies. Each case is not just a legal process; it is a strategic area that directly affects your business goals and quality of life.

international.title: International Presence
international.description: AOREN, founded in Ankara with the vision of our founding partners, quickly crossed national borders and became a reliable law brand serving internationally with its offices in Stuttgart, Istanbul and Ankara.

partnership.title: Our Strategic Partnership Approach
partnership.description: AOREN aims to establish long-term, trust-based relationships with each client. We design legal solutions not only at the level of regulatory compliance; but in a way that will support the sustainable growth of your business. In the face of complex problems, we bring together different disciplines to produce applicable solutions that reduce risks and save time.

talent.title: International Talent & Local Depth
talent.description: We complement our strong legal and academic infrastructure in Turkey with our strategic partnerships in Europe. From investments in the European market to family company structuring in Turkey, from multilingual and multi-legal problems, we offer multi-layered representation power to both individual and corporate clients.

interdisciplinary.title: Interdisciplinary Expertise Network
interdisciplinary.description: Under the AOREN umbrella, not only lawyers work; tax experts, cyber security consultants, sworn translators, financial analysts and academic consultants also serve. Thus, we look at a case not only from legal but also economic, technological and social perspectives.

digitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation and Transparency
digitalTransformation.description: We strengthen our services with technology, making them transparent and accessible. Thanks to the digital client portal specially developed for AOREN, you can access your documents, case processes and consultancy reports 24/7. In this way, we maintain open communication with you not only in words but also systematically.
